digest_items.title: Enable MFA for all admin accounts
digest_items.why: Multi-factor authentication prevents account takeover even if passwords are stolen
digest_items.fix: Use authenticator apps (Google Authenticator, Authy) or hardware keys (YubiKey)

digest_items.title: Use security linters in CI/CD
digest_items.why: Automated security checks catch vulnerabilities before deployment
digest_items.fix: Integrate tools like Bandit (Python), ESLint security plugin (JS)

digest_items.title: Implement disaster recovery plan
digest_items.why: Disasters and ransomware require tested recovery procedures
digest_items.fix: Document RTO/RPO, maintain offline backups, and test recovery quarterly

digest_items.title: Review third-party vendor access
digest_items.why: Excessive vendor permissions increase attack surface and compliance risk
digest_items.fix: Audit vendor access quarterly and apply principle of least privilege

digest_items.title: Use HSTS headers
digest_items.why: HTTP Strict Transport Security forces browsers to only connect via HTTPS

digest_items.title: Implement security monitoring
digest_items.why: Real-time monitoring detects attacks and anomalies early
digest_items.fix: Use SIEM tools and set up alerts for suspicious activities

digest_items.title: Verify encryption in transit
digest_items.why: Unencrypted data transmission exposes sensitive information
digest_items.fix: Enforce HTTPS for all endpoints and use TLS for internal services

digest_items.title: Implement API authentication
digest_items.why: Unauthenticated APIs allow unauthorized access to data and functions
digest_items.fix: Use OAuth 2.0, JWT tokens, or API keys with proper validation
